item.description:
Biagio is a great Friday night place for a wind-down after a busy week. So come on down, hang out with some friends and enjoy some wonderful Italian hospitality.
Biagio Ristorante & Bar

This is our latest "Third Friday" venue - we're planning on this being our regular "Third Friday" venue, so please let us know if you like it!

NOTE: Be very careful where you park. Do NOT park on or behind the Enterprise lot opposite the restaurant - you WILL be towed (and it will cost you $110+ to get your car back!!).
item.name: Biagio Ristorante and Bar
